entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
